snippet: VERDY--Violette. She was a breath of fresh air, a bright light, the colors of a rainbow. She surrounded you with warmth, talking, smiling and laughing all at the same time. Her presence was electric, as a performer and friend. Once you saw her in a ballet, you never forgot her performance. Fortunately, our memories will live. The George Balanchine Trust 1/3
